DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates the impact of endometrial scratching on endometrial secretion, when correlated to pregnancy.
DOC.brief_title: Cytokine Profile of the Uterine Secretome After Therapeutic Endometrial Scratching
DOC.criteria: IVF or ICSI patients with â‰¥1 previous implantation failure, despite transfer of a top quality embryo or blastocyst. Antagonist treatment FSH: 212 IU/L BMI: 1832 Regular menstrual cycle Written consent Suspected intrauterine abnormalities Planned use of specialized media or AHA
DOC.keyword: Endometrium, Cytokines, Endometrial secretion, Implantation, Endometrial scratching
